document.full_text: mr. bogdan's reels were so coveted that anglers were willing to spend years on a waiting list to buy them and then to pay far more than they would have for reels of only ordinary excellence.
document.title: stanley bogdan, maker of much-coveted fly reels, is dead at 92
lines_and_colors: mr. bogdan's reels were so coveted that anglers were willing to spend years on a waiting list to buy them and then to pay far more than they would have for reels of only ordinary excellence.
